doc.title: Army Information Film AIF No. 7: Code of Conduct - To Resist
doc.plot: One of a series of Army training films dealing with the prescribed Code of Conduct for soldiers. This episode details the responsibility of a captured soldier to resist any attempts by his captors to gain information or advantage from him. He is instructed neither to help nor to accept special favors from his captors, and to actively resist the enemy, always with an eye to escape.
